kw.name: And the user checks if is the right Sauce Labs Backpack is selected

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: And the user add 1 product to the cart
kw.sourcename: the user add ${number} product to the cart

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
